name: aq-touchpoint-demo
description: A demonstration of using the <aq-touchpoint/> custom element

scripts.build: foal rmdir build && cpx "src/**/*.html" build && tsc -p tsconfig.app.json
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "cpx "src/**/*.html" build -w" "tsc -p tsconfig.app.json -w" "supervisor -w ./build,./config -e js,json,yml, html --no-restart-on error ./build/index.js"
scripts.build:test: foal rmdir build && cpx "src/**/*.html" build && tsc -p tsconfig.test.json
scripts.test: npm run build:test && concurrently "cpx "src/**/*.html" build -w" "tsc -p tsconfig.test.json -w" "mocha --file ./build/test.js -w --watch-files build \"./build/**/*.spec.js\""
scripts.build:e2e: foal rmdir build && cpx "src/**/*.html" build && tsc -p tsconfig.e2e.json
scripts.e2e: npm run build:e2e && concurrently "cpx "src/**/*.html" build -w" "tsc -p tsconfig.e2e.json -w" "mocha --file ./build/e2e.js -w --watch-files build \"./build/e2e/**/*.js\""
scripts.makemigrations: foal rmdir build && tsc -p tsconfig.app.json && npx typeorm migration:generate src/migrations/migration -d build/db -p && tsc -p tsconfig.app.json
